doc.title: Enchanted Lake

credit.role: Himself - Conductor of Janssen Symphony Orchestra

doc.plot: The second of a series of nature and music shorts (called "Musicolor")produced by David L. Loew in association with conductor Werner Janssen. The initial entry was called "Toccatta and Fugue." This one is a panorama of the great Northwest section of the United States featuring turbulent streams, roaring waterfalls and snow-covered mountain peaks, while the music is provided by the Janssen Symphonic Orchestra of Los Angeles conducted by Werner Janssen.
